skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Wind Harmony
skillTree.description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.

skillTree.name: Ranged Discipline
skillTree.description: The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Searing Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Glittering Robe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Transmutation of Lead"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Transmutation of Lead Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Transmutation of Lead Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Final Transmutation"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Final Transmutation Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Violent
backgroundSkills.description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.

backgroundSkills.name: Sure-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.

backgroundSkills.name: Crafty
backgroundSkills.description: Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Driven
backgroundSkills.description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.

backgroundSkills.name: Trained
backgroundSkills.description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet of Foot
backgroundSkills.description: No being can kill what it cannot catch.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Lettered
backgroundSkills.description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: "The trick is to think two steps aheadâ€¦ and then think one step ahead of that."

backgroundSkills.name: Solid
backgroundSkills.description: This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.

backgroundSkills.name: Enured
backgroundSkills.description: Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapons Specialist
backgroundSkills.description: No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.

backgroundSkills.name: Martial Artist
backgroundSkills.description: When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.

backgroundSkills.name: Harmoniser
backgroundSkills.description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Daemons of Chaos
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bureaucrat
backgroundSkills.description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

backgroundSkills.name: Fervent Questioner
backgroundSkills.description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
